Text.Page:
[Special Orders]

After you left Exodor, the Valkyon Federation established a base in Exodor to explore the area and keep an eye on Azart movements in the vicinity.
We need to send supplies to this base, so come see me as soon as you get this.
You met the Loadmaster to get supplies for Exodor, and returned to Exodor using the Door of Dimension.

According to Dougal's message, an unstable teleportal appeared after the Black Core was destroyed.

We don't know what could come out from that teleportal... We must organize our defense.

Go to the Loadmasters and ask for support.

That's the exact kind of job we're looking for. Leave it to me.

I'll ask the other Loadmasters for help.

You've been to Exodor? That's quite surprising. A Door of Dimension to Exodor has opened. You should hear the details from Varlon.

I'll send you to Highwatch.

Say hi to Valron for me.

I'm glad you came. One of our brothers went to Exodor after receiving a message from Dougal.

You can now travel to Exodor using our teleportal. Use the teleportal to go to Exodor and meet Dougal.

Welcome!

I believe you already heard that a teleportal appeared after the Black Core was destroyed.

There're also Azart remnants nearby. I want you to stop them.
